name: Spatial Trainer
description:
2 - Tip upwards

Q - Tip left

W - Tip forwards

E - Tip right

S - Tip downwards

X - Tip backwards

[<, >] - Rotate third person cam

Esc - Menu/Quit

Very Important Information: The blue highlighted net face indicates which face is facing down 

Credit to kenney.nl for the temp wall textures

All other textures and music by Me
